title: Exhausted first responders work around the clock in North Carolina's mountains days after Helene's deluge
description: Residents of western North Carolina are lining up for water and food, hunting for cell signals and slogging buckets from creeks to flush toilets days after Hurricane Helene's remnants deluged the region
